Package imagingbook.calibration.zhang

Class NonlinearOptimizer

java.lang.Object
imagingbook.calibration.zhang.NonlinearOptimizer
Direct Known Subclasses:
NonlinearOptimizerAnalytic, NonlinearOptimizerNumeric
public abstract class NonlinearOptimizer extends Object
Abstract super-class for non-linear optimizers used for final, overall optimization of calibration parameters. The actual optimization is performed by the sub-classes.

    • optimize

      protected void optimize(Camera initCam, ViewTransform[] initViews)
      Performs Levenberg-Marquardt non-linear optimization to get better estimates of the parameters.
      Parameters:
      initCam - the initial camera parameters
      initViews - the initial view transforms
